sexAction.title: Continue working
sexAction.tooltip: Think, Dale, think! This work needs to be completed! You have no time to enjoy yourself!

description.text: Dale does his best to stay clam and focus on completing his paperwork, but every now and then he lets out a subdued grunt and mutters, [dale.speechNoEffects([style.random( Keep going... ~Mmm!~ That's good... | ~Ahh!~ You're good at this, [pc.name]... | Don't stop now... | That's it... ~Mmm!~ Keep going... )])]

Although he tries to do his best to focus on completing his paperwork, Dale can't help but buck his hips a little and groan under his breath, [dale.speechNoEffects([style.random( Keep going... ~Mmm!~ That's good... | ~Ahh!~ You're good at this, [pc.name]... | Don't stop now... | That's it... ~Mmm!~ Keep going... )])]

Doing his absolute best to focus on his work, Dale continues filling out the paperwork before him, and the only hint he gives that you're sucking his [dale.cock+] beneath his desk is the occasional quiet grunt or groan.
Despite gently bucking his hips or letting out the odd, quiet grunt, Dale manages to retain his composure and focus on completing his paperwork as you continue sucking his [dale.cock+].
